{"step_by_step_thinking": "The axillary nerve can be damaged in a variety of ways. According to the documents, it can be injured due to a fracture of the surgical neck of the humerus (Document 1), improper use of crutches (Document 1), and shoulder dislocation (Document 3). However, there is no mention of intramuscular injection causing damage to the axillary nerve.", "answer_choice": "B"}
